1.name: More than one quarter volume available

3.name: More than three quarters volume available

7.name: Full, mixed consignment
7.desc: Indicates that the equipment is fully loaded, and includes a number LCL (Less Than Container Load) consignments.

8.name: Full, single consignment
8.desc: Indicates that the container is fully loaded with a single FCL (Full Container Load) consignment.
